I'M BACK FROM MY BREAK! this update introduces POWER MASTERIES, a new POWER and SKINS, and TONS OF BALANCE CHANGES!

additions:
- ðŸ† added POWER MASTERIES, and removed the XP requirement to upgrade powers!
    - XP is now used to unlock masteries!
    - many diamond III powers have their own titles!
- ðŸ·ï¸ customize your CHAT COLOR in the profile editor!

improvements:
- âš¡ï¸ passive powers will now receive XP for every passively-generated power juice earned in a match
- ðŸ“± various UI improvements

balance changes:
- necromancer's staff:
    - added hybrid passive: 'tomb raiser': when you kill an enemy, a zombie is summoned beneath them! 5 second cooldown
- chair:
    - added hybrid passive: 'sedentary': every (25/24/22/20) seconds while sitting, you gain +5 max HP
- troll lootbox:
    - added hybrid passive: 'unboxing': when you kill an enemy, you have a (20/30/40/50)% chance to receive a random gear
- frostfire:
    - added hybrid active: 'create an icy explosion that freezes enemies and leaves behind a zone of fire with a (10/12/14/16) stud radius'
    - frostfire's old passive is now its hybrid passive: 'thermal protection'
- jack-o-launcher: explosions will now leave behind zones of fire
- puffer pal: knockback is now consistent
- shark bait: now instantly kills, but has a longer wait period with an indicator
- horn of the forlorn blizzard: increased range from 14 > 16

now that i'm back from my break, i would love to start adding more events and maps to the game! stay tuned, and as always-- happy plating!
bug fixes! fixed crate animations, inventory glitches, boomerang bugs, and an issue with the egg powers.
bug fixes! quick join will no longer try to send you to full servers, and quests have been fixed.

welcome to v1.30! this update brings back SUPA-SNOWMAN (with new rewards!), an ADVENT CALENDAR, TONS OF SKINS, and more!
